text: Herman Chernoff (born July 1, 1923) is an American applied mathematician, statistician and physicist. He was a professor at University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, Stanford, and MIT. He now works at Harvard University. Chernoff was born in New York City. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:Living people Category:American mathematicians Category:American physicists Category:University of Illinois faculty Category:Scientists from New York City Category:Writers from New York City Category:Harvard University faculty Category:American statisticians
title: Herman Chernoff
